name: nycgo_golden_dataset
title: NYC Governance Organizations Golden Dataset
description: Complete dataset of NYC governance organizations with internal metadata fields

fields.name: record_id
fields.title: Record ID
fields.description: Stable internal identifier (immutable primary key)

fields.name: name
fields.title: Name
fields.description: Official/preferred name of the organization

fields.name: name_alphabetized
fields.title: Name Alphabetized
fields.description: Name normalized for alphabetical sorting

fields.name: operational_status
fields.title: Operational Status
fields.description: Current status of the organization

fields.name: organization_type
fields.title: Organization Type
fields.description: Category classification of the organization

fields.name: description
fields.title: Description
fields.description: Detailed description of the organization's purpose and function

fields.name: url
fields.title: URL
fields.description: Official website URL

fields.name: alternate_or_former_names
fields.title: Alternate or Former Names
fields.description: Other names seen in official sources (semicolon-separated)

fields.name: acronym
fields.title: Acronym
fields.description: Official acronym (if any)

fields.name: alternate_or_former_acronyms
fields.title: Alternate or Former Acronyms
fields.description: Other acronyms seen in official sources

fields.name: budget_code
fields.title: Budget Code
fields.description: NYC budget code identifier

fields.name: open_datasets_url
fields.title: Open Datasets URL
fields.description: Link to related NYC Open Data datasets

fields.name: founding_year
fields.title: Founding Year
fields.description: Year the organization was founded/established

fields.name: principal_officer_full_name
fields.title: Principal Officer Full Name
fields.description: Full name of principal officer

fields.name: principal_officer_given_name
fields.title: Principal Officer Given Name
fields.description: Given (first) name of principal officer

fields.name: principal_officer_middle_name_or_initial
fields.title: Principal Officer Middle Name or Initial
fields.description: Middle name or initial of principal officer

fields.name: principal_officer_family_name
fields.title: Principal Officer Family Name
fields.description: Family (last) name of principal officer

fields.name: principal_officer_suffix
fields.title: Principal Officer Suffix
fields.description: Name suffix (Jr., Sr., III, etc.)

fields.name: principal_officer_name
fields.title: Principal Officer Name (Legacy)
fields.description: Full name of principal officer (legacy field)

fields.name: principal_officer_title
fields.title: Principal Officer Title
fields.description: Title of the principal officer

fields.name: principal_officer_contact_url
fields.title: Principal Officer Contact URL
fields.description: Profile/contact page URL for principal officer

fields.name: notes
fields.title: Notes
fields.description: Additional notes and context

fields.name: instance_of
fields.title: Instance Of
fields.description: Type classification

fields.name: name_nycgov_agency_list
fields.title: Name - NYC.gov Agency List
fields.description: Name as it appears on NYC.gov Agency List

fields.name: name_nycgov_mayors_office
fields.title: Name - NYC.gov Mayor's Office
fields.description: Name as it appears on Mayor's Office website

fields.name: name_nyc_open_data_portal
fields.title: Name - NYC Open Data Portal
fields.description: Name as it appears on NYC Open Data Portal

fields.name: name_oda
fields.title: Name - ODA
fields.description: Name as it appears in ODA system

fields.name: name_cpo
fields.title: Name - CPO
fields.description: Name as it appears in CPO system

fields.name: name_wegov
fields.title: Name - WeGov
fields.description: Name as it appears in WeGov system

fields.name: name_greenbook
fields.title: Name - Greenbook
fields.description: Name as it appears in Greenbook

fields.name: name_checkbook
fields.title: Name - Checkbook
fields.description: Name as it appears in Checkbook system

fields.name: name_hoo
fields.title: Name - HOO
fields.description: Name as it appears in HOO system

fields.name: name_ops
fields.title: Name - Ops
fields.description: Name as it appears in Ops system

fields.name: in_org_chart
fields.title: In Org Chart
fields.description: Flag indicating if entity appears in citywide org chart

fields.name: reports_to
fields.title: Reports To
fields.description: Reporting/administrative/oversight relationship

fields.name: reporting_notes
fields.title: Reporting Notes
fields.description: Notes about reporting relationships

fields.name: jan_2025_org_chart
fields.title: Jan 2025 Org Chart
fields.description: Flag indicating if entity appears in January 2025 org chart

fields.name: listed_in_nyc_gov_agency_directory
fields.title: Listed in NYC.gov Agency Directory
fields.description: Computed flag indicating if entity should appear in NYC.gov Agency Directory
